snippet: The moves are in reaction to the accidental revelation last month of the Central Intelligence Agency’s top spy in Afghanistan.
abstract: White House outlines steps it will take to prevent the disclosure of covert officials’ identities when president is traveling abroad; moves are in reaction to accidental revelation of Central Intelligence Agency’s top spy in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The moves are in reaction to the accidental revelation last month of the Central Intelligence Agency’s top spy in Afghanistan.

headline.main: White House Outlines Steps to Protect Covert Identities
headline.print_headline: White House Outlines Steps to Protect Covert Identities
